data.comment: In the minute -1, 9136 spectators are watching the match in Krasnodar.
The big names in today's match at Krasnodar Stadium have now been confirmed.
The match is underway at Krasnodar Stadium.
In the minute 1, Krasnodar awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Krasnodar in the half of Rostov.
Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Krasnodar in their own half.
In the minute 4, Krasnodar's Sergei Petrov gets in a shot on goal at Krasnodar Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Krasnodar have a dangerous throw-in.
Can Krasnodar get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Rostov's half?
In the minute 6, Ball goes out of play for a Rostov goal kick.
Rostov awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Eldor Shomurodov for Rostov drives towards goal at Krasnodar Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 9, In Krasnodar Krasnodar attack through Marcus Berg. The finish is off target, however.
Rostov have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Rostov.
In the minute 12, Rostov have been awarded a corner by Sergey Karasev.
Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Krasnodar.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 16, Throw-in for Krasnodar in their own half.
Tonny Vilhena (Krasnodar) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Eldor Shomurodov of Rostov gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 18, Corner awarded to Rostov.
In Krasnodar, Kento Hashimoto of Rostov is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Goal kick for Krasnodar at Krasnodar Stadium.
In the minute 20, Krasnodar drive upfield and Wanderson gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Rostov defender.
Krasnodar have been awarded a corner by Sergey Karasev.
Free kick for Rostov in their own half.
In the minute 21, Roman Eremenko (Rostov) gets in a great strike – straight into the post! Ohhhh so close!
It's a goal kick for the home team in Krasnodar.
In Krasnodar a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Rostov's Roman Eremenko has been booked in Krasnodar.
In the minute 27, Sergei Petrov (Krasnodar) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Krasnodar.
In the minute 32, Throw-in for Krasnodar at Krasnodar Stadium.
Throw-in Rostov.
Wanderson (Krasnodar) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 34, Can Krasnodar capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Rostov's half?
Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Rostov in their own half.
Rostov's Evgeni Chernov gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 36, Goal kick for Krasnodar at Krasnodar Stadium.
Krasnodar push forward at Krasnodar Stadium and Marcus Berg gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Rostov defence.
Kristoffer Olsson gets his shot on target but fails to score for Krasnodar.
In the minute 37, Corner awarded to Krasnodar.
Krasnodar surge into the attack at Krasnodar Stadium but Kaio Pantaleao’s header is off-target.
Sergey Karasev awards Rostov a goal kick.
In the minute 39, Eldor Shomurodov (Rostov) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in for Rostov in the half of Krasnodar.
Free kick Rostov.
In the minute 43, Sergey Karasev awards the home team a throw-in.
Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Krasnodar.
4 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Krasnodar.
In the minute 45, Ball safe as Rostov is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Rostov awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Krasnodar Krasnodar's Wanderson is caught offside.
In the minute 45, In Krasnodar Rostov drive forward through Mathias Normann. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Krasnodar are pushing forward but Tonny Vilhena's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Rostov goal kick.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
Sergey Karasev has blown to start the second-half.
Krasnodar to take a throw-in in Rostov territory.
In the minute 46, Sergey Karasev signals a Krasnodar throw-in in Rostov's half.
Free kick for Rostov in their own half.
Ball safe as Krasnodar is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 48, Free kick for Krasnodar in the half of Rostov.
In Krasnodar a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Rostov needs to be cautious. Krasnodar have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 51, Throw-in high up the field for Krasnodar in Krasnodar.
Krasnodar drive upfield and Wanderson gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Rostov defender.
Krasnodar have been awarded a corner by Sergey Karasev.
In the minute 53, Rostov's Roman Eremenko gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Krasnodar defender.
Free kick Rostov.
Throw-in for Krasnodar in their own half.
In the minute 54, Sergey Karasev awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in Rostov.
Sergey Karasev signals a throw-in for Rostov, close to Krasnodar's area.
In the minute 55, Alexey Ionov (Rostov) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Rostov are coming forward and Aleksey Kozlov gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Krasnodar have a goal kick.
In the minute 56, Krasnodar awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Rostov at Krasnodar Stadium.
Throw-in for Krasnodar at Krasnodar Stadium.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 59, Daniil Utkin is replacing Yuri Gazinskiy for Krasnodar at Krasnodar Stadium.
Kristoffer Olsson for Krasnodar drives towards goal at Krasnodar Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 60, Krasnodar have been awarded a corner by Sergey Karasev.
Corner awarded to Krasnodar.
Krasnodar attack but Daniil Utkin's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 62, Sergey Karasev awards Rostov a goal kick.
Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Rostov just outside Krasnodar's area.
Aleksandr Martynovich for Krasnodar has been booked by Sergey Karasev and receives a first yellow card.
Rostov drives forward and Mathias Normann gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 64, Valeri Karpin (Rostov) is making a first substitution, with Dmitri Poloz replacing Khoren Bayramyan.
Goal! Mathias Normann gives Rostov a 0-1 lead in Krasnodar.
In the minute 66, Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Rostov.
Krasnodar make their second substitution with Remy Cabella replacing Tonny Vilhena.
Rostov's Alexey Ionov gets in a shot on goal at Krasnodar Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 68, Krasnodar to take a throw-in in Rostov territory.
In Krasnodar Krasnodar drive forward through Wanderson. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Corner awarded to Krasnodar.
In the minute 72, Goal! Krasnodar go level at 1-1 through Marcus Berg in Krasnodar.
Sergei Petrov with an assist there.
Valeri Karpin is making the team's second substitution at Krasnodar Stadium with Aleksandr Dolgov replacing Alexey Ionov.
In the minute 74, The away team have replaced Kento Hashimoto with Danil Glebov. This is the third substitution made today by Valeri Karpin.
Sergei Petrov for Krasnodar gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Rostov at Krasnodar Stadium.
Remy Cabella (Krasnodar) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Sergey Karasev awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 78, Free kick for Rostov in their own half.
Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Krasnodar in their own half.
Krasnodar's Wanderson misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 79, It's a goal kick for the away team in Krasnodar.
The home team have replaced Viktor Claesson with Shapi Suleymanov. This is the third substitution made today by Murad Olegovich Musaev.
Throw-in for Rostov in their own half.
In the minute 82, Remy Cabella gets his shot on target but fails to score for Krasnodar.
Rostov awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Rostov in the half of Krasnodar.
In the minute 84, Krasnodar awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Krasnodar awarded a free kick in their own half.
The away team replace Eldor Shomurodov with David Tosevski.
In the minute 85, Valeri Karpin is making the team's fifth substitution at Krasnodar Stadium with Arseni Logashov replacing Roman Eremenko.
Krasnodar have been awarded a corner by Sergey Karasev.
Free kick Krasnodar.
In the minute 89, Free kick for Krasnodar in their own half.
Sergey Karasev signals a Rostov throw-in in Krasnodar's half.
Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Krasnodar in their own half.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Corner awarded to Krasnodar.
Throw-in for Krasnodar in the half of Rostov.
Ball safe as Krasnodar is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Rostov in their own half.
Krasnodar awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Sergey Karasev awards the home team a throw-in.
In Krasnodar a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ball goes out of play for a Krasnodar goal kick.
That's full-time at Krasnodar Stadium. The final score is 1-1.
At Krasnodar Stadium, David Tosevski has been yellow-carded for the away team.
